text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Pokke. 
Today's your birthday right? 
Happy birthday～

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
I mean, isn't there like a present 
or something you'd give with love 
on a day like this?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Eww! ! Nothing like that on me.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
That's cold. Well, hang out 
with me for a bit then!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
I got a comedy skit CD from 
a friend, but there's no point 
watching it alone.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Huh～ But why me? 
Wouldn't it be better watching 
it with your friend instead?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
You're my friend too, no? 
You wished me happy 
birthday even! Also—

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
You laugh louder when you're 
with friends, right? I wanna join in 
on your fun too!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Ah… sheesh… Fine, fine. 
I'll come watch it with you! 
Why're you always this clingy…?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Haha, don't be shy! 
Aight, let's get some snacks and 
meet in my room after!
